For what purpose we collect and use your personal data?

Your personal data will be used for the purpose of applying the evaluations required by you either as part of the selection processes, evaluation of the company that has invited you and / or as part of a purchase that you made on our site to evaluate yourself, as well as we also use your data to inform about changes or new products or services that are related to the contract acquired by you.
Similarly, in order to comply with obligations contracted with you, evaluate the quality of our services and conduct internal studies on consumer habits.

For the purposes indicated in this privacy notice, we may collect your personal data in different ways, whether you provide it to us directly, by participating in our or a client of eval.com evaluations, selection processes and / or promotions of self-assessments, competence development programs or related courses when using our web portal, when making use of online services, in general when making use of any of our advertising and marketing means, and from other sources permitted by the Mexican laws and their subjective laws in other countries where evaluate.com has a presence with similar policies, and particularly in those where our platform operates.

In accordance with the provisions of article 9 of the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Individuals, applicable to the United Mexican States, and the subjective laws in the countries where our platform operates, we require your express consent for the treatment of your sensitive personal data, for which we ask you to indicate your agreement with the conditions of this treatment.

Your data may travel to another country or be shared with others

Your personal data may be transferred and processed within and outside the country by people other than this company, in this sense your information may be shared with subsidiaries, affiliates, third parties, who legally represent our rights and interests, and in general with any other natural and / or legal persons, with the exclusive purpose of complying with the obligations contracted with you.

We undertake not to transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except for the exceptions provided in article 37 of the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties for the United Mexican States, as well as the provisions of subjective Laws of similar matters that apply in the countries where our platform operates; as well as to carry out this transfer in the terms of the aforementioned Law.

By virtue of the fact that we will transfer sensitive personal data, we require your express consent, in accordance with what is established in article 9 of the Law on the matter, for which we ask you to indicate whether you accept this transfer.

We reserve the right to make modifications or updates to this privacy notice at any time, in order to attend to new legislation, internal policies or new requirements for the provision or offering of our services or products.
These modifications will be available to the public through the following means:
Visible advertisements in our establishments or customer service centers.
Leaflets or brochures available in our establishments or customer service centers.
Via email to the last address provided by you.
To whom can you present your complaints and reports regarding the improper treatment of your personal data?

If you consider that your right to protect personal data has been harmed by any conduct of our employees, our actions or responses, you presume that in the processing of your personal data there is a violation of the provisions set forth in the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data in Possession of Individuals, and the subjective data applicable in each country where our platform operates, you may file the corresponding complaint or complaint with the National Institute of Transparency, Access to Information and Protection of Personal Data (INAI), for more information visit the site http://inicio.inai.org.mx/SitePages/ifai.aspx, (in Mexico), or the government sites that regulate these provisions in all countries where our services operate.

The time we retain your personal data will be as long as they are our clients, the data collected is only for integration purposes, when the contract service with evaluar.com ends, your data from zoom will be deleted.

La Evolución de la Inteligencia Artificial en Recursos Humanos
La Evolución de la Inteligencia Artificial en Recursos Humanos

La inteligencia artificial (IA) ha experimentado una trayectoria fascinante que se remonta a sus primeros días en la década de 1950, cuando Alan Turing propuso la famosa "Prueba de Turing". Desde entonces, los hitos en este viaje tecnológico han sido abundantes, marcando avances notables que han redefinido la capacidad de las máquinas para realizar tareas cognitivas complejas. Exploremos los hitos clave de la IA, desde la victoria de IBM's Deep Blue en 1997 hasta los avances en aprendizaje profundo y procesamiento de lenguaje natural en la década de 2010, y cómo esta evolución ha llegado a transformar el ámbito de recursos humanos en el mundo empresarial actual.
